txt.en: Self-described adventurer extraordinaire Theodore Gorse is tracking Treasure Bugans across some dangerous places in Middle-earth. Meet him to begin a profitable partnership!
Complete to receive your first Coin of the Bugan
Theodore Gorse, adventurer extraordinaire, has discovered that mischievous Treasure Bugans have begun to appear in dangerous places across Middle-earth.
The Treasure Bugan Event is Here!

Theodore Gorse can be found within any of these instances:
Barad Guldur
Blood of the Black Serpent
Dungeons of Dol Guldur
Eithel Gwaur
Flight to the Lonely Mountain
Fornost: Wraith of Earth
Fornost: Wraith of Fire
Fornost: Wraith of Shadow

Treasure Bugans have appeared in Instances across Middle-earth!
Complete to receive your first Coin of the Bugan

Theodore Gorse (and possibly Treasure Bugans) can be found within any of these instances:
Barad Guldur
Blood of the Black Serpent
Dungeons of Dol Guldur
